laws.description: The birthplace of the Civil Rights Movement, where Rosa Parks took a stand (or kept her seat) in 1955! 🚌
laws.laws_prep: Uh-oh 😱 Looks like there are some laws that might restrict voting access. This means...
laws.restrictive_laws:
❌ Less time to apply for a mail ballot 
❌ Less access for voters with disabilities
laws.expansive_laws: There are no new expansive laws in your state.

laws.description: The home of 229+ Indigenous tribes! Brrr it's cold up here ❄️
laws.laws_prep: Looks like there's no new legislation in your state! 🦗 🍃
laws.restrictive_laws: There are no new restrictive laws in your state.
laws.expansive_laws: There are no new expansive laws in your state.

laws.description: The Copper State! Known for natural wonders & the Grand Canyon 🏞️
laws.laws_prep: Woah! 😳 Looks like your state has a mix of expansive and restrictive laws. This means...
laws.restrictive_laws:
❌ Harder to stay on an absentee voting list
❌ Harder to pass signature requirements
❌ More registration list clean-ups ✏️
❌ Less ballot drop-off locations
❌ Harsher voter ID requirements
laws.expansive_laws:
On the bright side...

✅ Easier to register to vote
✅ More chances to register on Election Day! 🎉

laws.description: The home of the Little Rock Nine 👩🏾‍🎓 & birthplace of Black Panther, Eldridge Cleaver 🐈‍⬛
laws.laws_prep: Uh-oh 😱 Looks like there are some laws that might restrict voting access. This means...
laws.restrictive_laws:
❌ Less time to apply for a mail ballot
❌ Less time to deliver your mail ballot ⌛
❌ Less assistance in returning a ballot
❌ Harsher voter ID requirements
laws.expansive_laws: There are no new expansive laws in your state.

laws.description: The home of the Black Panther Party! ✊🏾 Also known for 🍷, 🏄 and 🍄
laws.laws_prep: Hurray! 🥳 Looks like there are some legislation that expanded your voting access. This means...
laws.restrictive_laws: There are no new restrictive laws in your state.
laws.expansive_laws:
✅ Easier to vote by mail 📬
✅ More ballot drop-off locations 📩
